identifier: mr. electric of fort worth:fort worth, tx

data.name: Mr. Electric of Fort Worth Fort Worth, TX

reviews.text:
Best service experience in Fort Worth so far!! Our family needed some indoor lighting installed. I googled electricians and found Mr. electric of Fort Worth. I read further and noticed that Mr. Travis was highly recommended. I scheduled the appointment and Mr. Travis and Dalton showed up on time. They worked super hard on lighting that was quite tricky, but their dispositions never reflected the difficulty of the job.

I trust that the work was done with top-notch care and quality. Highly recomm

Dylan explained everything that he was going to do to find our electrical problem.  He told me the range of charges ahead of the work.    I will definitely recommend.  I thought this kind of service didn't exist anymore.  Reminds me of the days long ago when people cared about their professions and their customers.  Thank you so much Dylan and Brodie!!  You were truly a blessing today.

Just had my 3rd chandelier installed by master electrician Travis with Mr. Electric !  Travis goes above and beyond to make sure every detail is covered in the installation and care of the light fixture.  All 3 of my installations with Travis have been large chandelier jobs and Travis installed them perfectly, and they were an entire day jobs !  Many thanks to Travis !

8/6/2025:   Another fabulous job of hanging 3 light fixtures by Travis and Clayton with Mr. Electric!   Always very professiona

Travis and Clayton came out and they were very knowledgeable and polite and did a fantastic job.  I was very impressed.  Great company!  Call them. You wont be disappointed!  See the surge protector they installed. Notice how neat ?

Kaleb did an amazing job going through every possible solution for my flickering lights while running an electric water heater. He was great to be around and comforting in his analysis of what could be wrong, as this is the first home we've bought, so everything is still foreign to us. He even point out some other things with my home that weren't in the scope of work, and gave me recommendations on how to fix, all while being respectful about the findings. He left his business card and I'll be a

Jayden and Rhett did an absolutely amazing job replacing our breaker box and labeling our new panel. Both of them were positive, courteous, respectable, and professional.. We would recommend them to anyone needing their service. They freely answered all of our questions and educated us about things regarding our homes electric system that we did not know. Let Mr. Electric help you because he knows what he’s doing!

Erik Carr was my electrician and he did a great job!  I had many special concerns and questions and he took care of everything.  I plan to use him for all my electrical needs and recommend him to all my friends and neighbors!  The company was efficient, courteous and on time!  Happy customer

I recently moved to the Fort Worth area. I discovered a bad breaker in my panel. I knew I had a few other seemingly minor electrical issues in my old (but new to me) house. Rather than replace the breaker myself, I called Mr. Electric of Fort Worth based on the strength of their reviews. They were able to schedule a technician promptly at a day and time that worked for me.

The technician, Erik Carr, was great. He inspected my panel and identified multiple issues that I was unaware of. For examp

I asked for Erik Carr to come back and do upgrades to my home after the fantastic job he did repairing damage a different companies installer caused. He is so professional and does a great job explaining what needs to be done, why and how it will be done. It’s a pleasure having him in my home and I feel confident in his work.
I will highly recommend Mr. Electric and Eric Carr to any of my friends and family that need electrical work done.
Already planning my next upgrade project.
Thank you Eric

Mr.Electric was timely, knowledgeable, and professional! Dylan and his helper were quick and helpful with questions. Had some outlets added and they helped provide options. Would
Highly recommend! They support Veterans and pricing is fair.
Jake did a great job installing our Ring Doorbell and he made a beautiful plate to go behind it.  He then assisted me with downloading and installing the software.  Awesome customer service!
Erik was a breath of fresh air. Very polite and courteous. Hand shake with eye contact...love that. Very knowledgeable. Changed 2 faulty breakers and added a surge protector. Job well done!

I recently had Kaleb come out to install recessed lighting in my home, and I couldn’t be more impressed with the results. From start to finish, he was professional, efficient, and clearly very knowledgeable about his craft. He took the time to explain the layout and positioning to make sure everything would look just right — and it absolutely does.

The lighting completely transformed the front house, giving it a clean, modern feel. Kaleb worked quickly but with great attention to detail, making

Mr Electric has helped us on three separate occasions over the past five years and the service has been outstanding every time.

Every one of their employees (with whom we have dealt) has been caring and helpful.  Their  customer scheduling staff is always compassionate and accommodating.  And, we can’t speak highly enough of the skilled/certified electricians who have come to our home and efficiently & effectively solved whatever issue we had at the time.

Based on our personal experiences, we

We called Mr Electric and Cody and Brody came out today. We explained some of the things that we wanted done. While working in the kitchen they found two gfci outlets were hot so they replaced both of them.

They also rewired our newly installed ceiling fans, ensuring that the light/fan switches worked properly.

They did not, so Cody explains Ned what wall switches we needed. We ran to Lowe’s and got the proper switches, while they waited, and which they quickly installed.

Both Cody and Brody

As a whole the staff at the company are very professional,  courteous and timely. More importantly the pricing was incredibly fair and honest. I could not believe the difference in estimated price from the other two companies. No comparison. And the work performed was of excellent quality. The two electricians, Cody and Brodie were both professional and really good dudes. The honesty and assessment of my electrical concerns are really appreciated. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

My tech, Dylan, was excellent. We discussed what I wanted, he explained the process, my options and his recommendations very clearly. After deciding how I wanted to proceed (with zero pressure or upsell), he prepared my quote. The work was entirely satisfactory and he left the place clean and neat, explaining everything that was done and asking if I was satisfied. He was also very friendly and professional.

I appreciated that Mr. Electric sent a picture of the tech so I would be sure who I was

Dylan Michael was my electrician and he did an amazing job! Not only was he on time and extremely professional but he helped put my mind at ease with a very stressful situation. He communicated clearly on everything and he did everything he promised to do. He is by far one of the best electricians I've ever had and I would venture to say he is the best contractor I've ever worked with, and I've worked with a lot of them.

I will definitely recommend Mr. Electric to anyone that is looking for ele

Dylan did a great job explaining the problem and presenting the options. The work was done quickly and very well. We thought the whole panel would need work and while he said we could benefit from that, he told us our real issue was caused by poor weatherproofing on our outdoor outlets. We're grateful for the honesty and excellent work.

This company is great at communication and we were contacted multiple times by the ladies in the office when our appointment was and when our electrician would arrive. Aaron was our electrician and he was so professional and very efficient in finding and fixing our problem. He was so nice and showed me exactly what happened and how he was going to fix it so we could get power back in our living room. If you need electrical work done and need a dependable and honest company to get the job done th
Jayce did a great job swapping out our chandelier to the new one we purchased as well as exchanging bulbs in another one. He also added a remote to a light/fan combo for us.

6 stars!  Aaron was truly awesome. I called at 9 AM, the dispatcher scheduled me for the same day and Aaron showed up just up at about 2 PM.  My job wasn’t difficult just time consuming. Aaron had a great attitude, was very knowledgeable, respectable, and the fix was well explained. The pricing was fair and I couldn’t have asked for a better result. Stop reading, call the number and ask for Aaron!

Earlier this month I had an electric vehicle wall charger installed in my garage by Mr. Electric. The installation was performed by Cody Ables, lead technician and his associate, Rhet Henson. A few days prior to the day of installation, Cody had done a preliminary inspection of my garage and its electrical infrastructure to formulate a plan for the installation of the wall charger. His foresight in doing this, was demonstrated on installation day by the efficient implementation of that plan: Req
Timely, professional, personable and caring. We are thrilled with the work, pricing and care taken. David was our technician and I would personally ask for him again if we need any further work.
Jayce did an excellent job installing my patio light. He traced down an electrical issue first and then did a professional job on the installation itself. I would use this company again.

I had a very satisfactory experience working with Kaleb Ansell with Mr. Electric. Kaleb gave me amazing customer service. He was professional, knowledgeable and personable. He gave me multiple options as possible solutions to our issue. All and all it was a very positive experience. I would recommend Kaleb and Mr. Electric to anyone looking for smoke alarm replacements.

Ray and Dalton took care of us beautifully. They had to install an entirely new fuse box and determine the fuses’ destinations on a house that was built in 1929. They were extraordinarily patient and even seemed to have fun figuring out the many challenges that come with older homes. We are unbelievably grateful for their expertise and their kindness.

You will not regret calling these guys. Our electrician, Erik Carr, did everything he said he would and then some. When scheduling his trips, he communicated in a very, willingly to work with us, kind of way. Which was refreshing. His work was professional, clean and fast. You can tell when someone knows what they're doing and Erik knows his stuff. He even answered the phone past working hours to answer a question I had. Highly recommend Mr. Electric!

Travis was a pleasure to deal with! Super great guy and helped me come up with a solution to my unique problem and got the job done within an hour! Chatted the whole time, just like a good buddy! 10/10 recommend! Will use Travis in the future!

Very friendly, polite, knowledgeable, and explained everything so that I could understand.  Will call again when I need an electrician.  Have already reconnected him to a friend.  He accomplished everything I needed done.

We had such a great experience working with Jake and Erik. From start to finish, they were thorough, kind, and made sure we felt completely taken care of. They gave us plenty of time to ask questions, explore different options, and understand each step of the process. Their explanations were clear and detailed, and we never felt rushed or brushed off. When we had an additional concern after Erik's initial visit, he came back with Jake and without hesitation and handled it just as professionally

The repair to my meter base was prompt, thorough and accurate. The technician quoted reattaching it to my house and other repairs. After authorization, he took charge of the situation and expedited the repair. He kept me apprised of the progress annd arranged for the code inspection the next day. A different technician arrived early the next day and waited for the inspector. Mr. Electric is a professional company and I would highly recommend them.

The tech who did the work, Clayton Kelly, was friendly and professional.  He thoroughly explained what was happening and the corrective action he recommended.  He did exactly what we agreed upon and showed me the work and how to utilize it.  He was first class.

We had a smoke detector that was chirping. Jayden Fleming and Jake from Mr Electric came out and remedied our problem right away by installing new detectors. They were courteous and helpful and efficient! They did a great job! We certainly recommend Mr Electric Fort Worth -thank you for your speedy service!
Erik and Josh did a fantastic and timely job installing our new chandelier! Communication was great from Mr. Electric also. Don’t hesitate to hire these guys!

I had a long list of electrical problems in my older home. Cody attacked each one expertly and efficiently. He was very kind and very good at explaining how everything worked. I will definitely call this company again!
He did such a good job that I had him come out again. This time he had David with him. They installed my new doorbell and they both did a super job. I will always call Mr. Electric!!!

I used them on two occasions: first, to convert an outlet for an oven (double amp), and second, to replace a burned switch (which I supplied).
The service was VERY costly, with unclear pricing. The claimed service fee waiver appeared to be simply an adjustment (add and subtract).
For each visit, the cost exceeded $400 for work completed in under an hour. While the technicians were courteous and demonstrated professionalism, they did not exceed basic expectations given the price. I had to specifi

I had my electric off for 11 days because of a storm that came through October 24th and it blew down a tree in our backyard.  That did a lot of damage to the electrical.  Oncor came out to turn the power off, and told us to call an electrician. So  I  received 5 estimates all of them were so high.  Myself and my partner are elderly and I’m disabled and on Oxygen 24-7 but when we called MR ELECTRIC AND that’s when I got to meet Jake!   He put in the estimate I was trying to decide  to go ahead wi

We had Cody come out to look at our electrical in our outdoor seating area. We did a basic diagnostic to be ran to figure out the issue which starts at $250. He found that our gfci has been tripped on an outlet we had previously checked, but looks to be the issue after diagnostic had been done. Cody was so friendly, professional, bad explained everything of the flow of the power in my backyard so I knew for the future. Thank you, Cody!

First and foremost, I couldn’t be more happy and impressed with the service I received. Everything from the communication to the incredible same day service provided by Cody was top notch. The issue was explained in detail and I quite simply don’t have a single negative thing to say. Cody was extremely professional and I will 100% do business again

Kaleb from Mr. Electric was awesome! He quickly diagnosed the issue with my Ring doorbell, explaining that house chimes can sometimes cause problems. He disconnected the chimes and made sure the doorbell had the right voltage — all done in under an hour. Super friendly, professional, and knowledgeable. Highly recommend him and Mr. Electric!
Erik and Jake were working in my house today.....they did a very professional job and explained and answered every question in a good manner....I recommend this company..

I have used Mr Electric of Fort Worth in the past.  I called them again for some ceiling fan installation and light and door bell replacement.  They did a great job.  I will use them for any future projects.  Definitely a top notch organization.

Excellent service from the technician that came out today. This was my first time using this company and the technician was very polite, took the time to explain everything to me, and detailed all of the costs out up front.

Clayton was awesome: courteous, knowledgeable and professional. He came in diagnosed the problem and quickly identified what happened and repaired the damaged wiring. We had a small electrical fire in our attic last night, and Mr. Electric came to our rescue today!

Mr. Electric made scheduling fast and easy, and Erik is a pleasure to work with. He’s kind, personable, and easygoing, with great communication throughout the process. His honesty and attention to detail give me full confidence in the work he’s doing, and his hospitable approach makes the whole experience stress-free. Excellent service! I highly recommend Mr. Electric and Erik.

Cody was my technician and he was very pleasant. He explained everything he was going to do in detail. I was shown pictures of things that needed repair. Then after he was done he made sure I checked everything & showed before and after pictures of all the repairs.  He was great!!!
David Sandafer installed new LED lighting in our house and we are so happy to be able to see again!  The new lights are brighter and much more modern.  We are still admiring them a week later.
Kaleb was phenomenal, kind, knowledgeable. He was on time and courteous. The work was better than expected. We will use Mr. Electric again..Thank you. Bw in Hudson Oaks
